aboutDescription:
My name is Eden, I graduated with a bachelor's degree in software engineering.
 I eager to build on my academic foundations of software engineer through continued coursework and professional development and stay in tune with the latest technologies through continued coursework.
 My hunger for knowledge and determination to turn information into action has contributed to my most recent success to movies subscroptions project. There, I learned new technologies, improved my coding skill and bring my own creative way.
 A tenet I lives out through is my interests in everything related to sports activities, hiking, reading books,  and painting mandales.
 These days I am looking for my first job, I am looking for a job with good vibes where I can express my skills and grow in it.
 You are welcome to look at the attached projects and resume.
 If you think there may be a match between us, feel free to contact me on the contact page.
contactDescription: I am available on almost every social media. You can message me, I will reply within 24 hours.
